Bash(python -c "
import asyncio
import httpx

API_KEY = ''rl-74ab5119-1bf5-49dc-8c00-527fe540c205''
BASE_URL = ''https://api.rocketlane.com/api/1.0''

async def test\(\):
    params = {''pageSize'': 5}
    headers = {''accept'': ''application/json'', ''api-key'': API_KEY}
    async with httpx.AsyncClient\(\) as client:
        response = await client.get\(f''{BASE_URL}/projects'', headers=headers, params=params, timeout=30\)
        data = response.json\(\)
        print\(''Keys in response:'', list\(data.keys\(\)\) if isinstance\(data, dict\) else ''not a dict''\)
        projects = data.get\(''data'', data.get\(''results'', data\)\) if isinstance\(data, dict\) else data
        print\(f''Found {len\(projects\)} projects''\)
        for p in projects[:2]:
            print\(f''  Project type: {type\(p\)}, keys: {list\(p.keys\(\)\) if isinstance\(p, dict\) else ""not dict""}''\)

asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
")
